content.rendered:
Directed by M. Rajesh

Written by M. Rajesh

Cast Sivakarthikeyan (Manohar). Nayanthara (Keerthana Vasudevan). Radhika Sarathkumar (Easwari). Sathish (Raja). Yogi Babu (Auto Sekar). Narayan Lucky (Ashwin). Thambi Ramaiah (Lakshman (as Thambi Ramayya)). Robo Shankar (Kuthala Sithambaram). John Vijay (Arjun Reddy). Harija (Divya). Nakshathra Nagesh (Sowmiya (Serial Artist)). Thaadi Balaji (Serial Director (as Balaji)). Shalu Shammu (Asha Jasmine). Anil Murali (Inspector Prasanna Kumar) . Lizzie Antony (Keerthana Vasudevan’s Advocate)

Languages Tamil

Producers Ev Dineshkumar. K.E. Gnanavelraja

Production Studio Gree
